description:
Take a look at our wide range of commercial tables for contract use, ideal for restaurants, cafes, bars. We supply tables and table bases in all shapes, sizes & heights. Such as coffee tables, occasional tables, lamp tables, dining tables and poseur tables. Available in a range of wooden and metal finishes for indoor and outdoor use all tested to contract standard. We are pleased to offer a selection of:
  • Traditional Wooden Tables,
  • Laminate Tables,
  • Glass Tables,
  • Teak,
  • EZ Care & Werzalit Tables.
Don't see anything you like or that fits your needs? Get in touch and we'll do all we can to help make your vision a reality!
